attributes.action: Britain to BAN United Airlines to fly to and from UK.
attributes.additional_details:
United Airlines: Passenger forcibly removed from flight
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-us-canada-39554421

United Airlines Passenger Is Dragged From an Overbooked Flight
https://www.nytimes.com/2017/04/10/business/united-flight-passenger-dragged.html?_r=0
attributes.background:
Need i say more?

If this was British Airways or Monarch i can assure you the whole world would demand this.

rejection.details: The rules governing banning aircraft are decided with the EU and in reference to the Chicago Convention on International Civil Aviation.
